name: Left 4 Dead Card Game
description:
Created for Game.Dev Competition 22 - Genre Benders (June 2009)

All copyrights and trademarks are reserved by their owners.

Left 4 Dead Card Game is a co-op survival where players fight zombies, find items and deal with hazards by drawing from a deck of cards. In the first round players are looking for items and trying to survive and the second round is an endurance while waiting for rescue. It is a tense, re-playable puzzle based on the PC game.

Won 1st Place in Game.Dev Competition 22 "Genre Benders!"

"Print the cards out on heavy stock paper and start playing. That’s all you need to do to have a great evening. Valve needs to know about this little gem."

BoardGameGeek forum post
